definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: There is a power point for shaver in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 浴室裏有供電動剃鬚刀用的電源插座。

sentences.english: His face was slashed with a razor -blade .
sentences.chinese: 他的臉被剃鬚刀刮傷了。

sentences.english: The men's shavers are on the table.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人的電動剃鬚刀在桌上。

sentences.english: Promoting the sale of your shavers has proved unsuccessfull.
sentences.chinese: 推銷你們的剃鬚刀不很順利。

sentences.english: My electric shaver works on these batteries.
sentences.chinese: 我的電動剃鬚刀就用這些電池。

sentences.english: Each person should have his own towel, clothes and shaving razor.
sentences.chinese: 每個人應該都有他自己的毛巾，衣服和剃鬚刀。

sentences.english: Clean the shave after each use to keep the cutting edge sharp.
sentences.chinese: 每次使用完後要清理電動剃鬚刀以保持刃口鋒利。

sentences.english: Why didn't you pack your toothbrush and shaver into your suitcase?
sentences.chinese: 行李裏怎麼沒帶牙刷和剃鬚刀啊？

sentences.english: She was cutting herself with a razor when she felt sad or upset.
sentences.chinese: 當她感到傷心或沮喪時，她就用剃鬚刀割傷自己。

sentences.english: A double edged razor will last a lot longer than disposable razors.
sentences.chinese: 雙面剃鬚刀比可拋棄型剃刀壽命長的多。

sentences.english: 8-6. As it happens, a razor that is safe in Europe is unlikely to electrocute Americans.
sentences.chinese: 碰巧在歐洲使用安全的剃鬚刀不大可能電死美國人。

sentences.english: Across the board, the match-up differences seem razor thin.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些來看，對位差距看起來跟剃鬚刀片一樣薄。
那是我父親的電動剃鬚刀。

sentences.english: The shaver can be charged up and used when traveling.
sentences.chinese: 這咱剃鬚刀可以充電供旅行中使用。

sentences.english: I need a packet of razor blades and some aspirins.
sentences.chinese: 我要一盒剃鬚刀片和一些阿司匹林。
